channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Socio -- WP Telegram Widget and Join Link
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Socio -- WP Telegram Widget and Join Link

item.title: CVE-2024-43309|2024-08-19T14:41:51.761Z -- wp%20socio -- wp%20telegram%20widget%20and%20join%20link
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Socio WP Telegram Widget and Join Link allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Telegram Widget and Join Link: from n/a through 2.1.27.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Socio WP Telegram Widget and Join Link allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Telegram Widget and Join Link: from n/a through 2.1.27.
